abilities.description: Your deflector array clears the way for safer passage. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition} through debris or asteroid fields, boost.

Your inertial dampeners protect the ship's vital systems. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3782f1b3c8ca8b88]{Withstand Damage} from spaceborne environmental factors, add +2.

Your gravity compensators create an isolating graviton field about your ship. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} from gravitational forces around a star or stellar phenomenon, you may reroll any dice.
